Custom Attributes

Get a custom attribute details

GET

/

api

/

v1

/

accounts

/

{account\_id}

/

custom\_attribute\_definitions

/

{id}

Try it

cURL

Python

JavaScript

PHP

Go

Java

Copy

```
curl --request GET \
  --url https://app.chatwoot.com/api/v1/accounts/{account_id}/custom_attribute_definitions/{id} \
  --header 'api_access_token: <api-key>'
```

200

401

404

Copy

```
{
  "id": 123,
  "attribute_display_name": "<string>",
  "attribute_display_type": "<string>",
  "attribute_description": "<string>",
  "attribute_key": "<string>",
  "regex_pattern": "<string>",
  "regex_cue": "<string>",
  "attribute_values": "<string>",
  "attribute_model": "<string>",
  "default_value": "<string>",
  "created_at": "<string>",
  "updated_at": "<string>"
}
```

#### Authorizations

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-attributes/get-a-custom-attribute-details#authorization-api-access-token)

api\_access\_token

string

header

required

This token can be obtained by visiting the profile page or via rails console. Provides access to endpoints based on the user permissions levels. This token can be saved by an external system when user is created via API, to perform activities on behalf of the user.

#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-attributes/get-a-custom-attribute-details#parameter-account-id)

account\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the account

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-attributes/get-a-custom-attribute-details#parameter-id)

id

integer

required

The ID of the custom attribute to be updated.

#### Response

200

200401404

application/json

Success

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-attributes/get-a-custom-attribute-details#response-id)

id

integer

Identifier

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-attributes/get-a-custom-attribute-details#response-attribute-display-name)

attribute\_display\_name

string

Attribute display name

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-attributes/get-a-custom-attribute-details#response-attribute-display-type)

attribute\_display\_type

string

Attribute display type (text, number, currency, percent, link, date, list, checkbox)

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-attributes/get-a-custom-attribute-details#response-attribute-description)

attribute\_description

string

Attribute description

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-attributes/get-a-custom-attribute-details#response-attribute-key)

attribute\_key

string

Attribute unique key value

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-attributes/get-a-custom-attribute-details#response-regex-pattern)

regex\_pattern

string

Regex pattern

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-attributes/get-a-custom-attribute-details#response-regex-cue)

regex\_cue

string

Regex cue

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-attributes/get-a-custom-attribute-details#response-attribute-values)

attribute\_values

string

Attribute values

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-attributes/get-a-custom-attribute-details#response-attribute-model)

attribute\_model

string

Attribute type(conversation\_attribute/contact\_attribute)

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-attributes/get-a-custom-attribute-details#response-default-value)

default\_value

string

Attribute default value

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-attributes/get-a-custom-attribute-details#response-created-at)

created\_at

string

The date and time when the custom attribute was created

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-attributes/get-a-custom-attribute-details#response-updated-at)

updated\_at

string

The date and time when the custom attribute was updated
